column4: Will there be difference in CPU-load and memory using Ubuntu Dapper server compare to Debian Sarge server? Both without X. The computer will work as a Jabberserver and Spamassassin.
I would use Debian stable, but that's just me
debian stable is a truly stable server platform; security is excellent
And all the commands are the same in Debian like apt-get update, ssh user@ip -p port? And hosts.allow, hosts.deny is also easily found?
let us know how things go (or see you in #debian :-)

oh stop your witch hunt and political correctness
